H0.text: Which American state, with the capital Salem, is nicknamed the Beaver State. Washington

H1.text: Which American state, with the capital Salem, is nicknamed the Beaver State. Idaho

H2.text: Which American state, with the capital Salem, is nicknamed the Beaver State. Montana

H3.text: Which American state, with the capital Salem, is nicknamed the Beaver State. Ore.

A4.text: Salem, the capital of Oregon, U.S.A.
